pages.text: Leonard is the patron of witches, $(l:bewitchment:brewing/brewing_basics)Brewing$() and...$(br2)Leonard is a $(l:bewitchment:creatures/demon)Greater Demon$(); he can be $(l:bewitchment:tools/grotesque_stew)Pledged$() to.$(br2)Witches $(l:bewitchment:tools/grotesque_stew)Pledged$() to Leonard are able to use two potency modifiers when $(l:bewitchment:brewing/brewing_basics)Brewing$() instead of one. $(l:bewitchment:tools/grotesque_stew)Pledging$() to Leonard also allows players to $(l:bewitchment:tools/witch_cauldron#teleportation)Warp$() using $(l:bewitchment:tools/witch_cauldron)Witch Cauldrons$() without using any $(l:bewitchment:introduction/altars)ME$().
